unnormalised: Bore, tumi fuel efficiency vixim chintun asat, haina? Aizkal hem konnakui lagta, khas korun petrolache kimati kitekai zagear ₹110/litre poryan pauleat. Hem pissen vatta! Ani tumka dishta ki tumi tea expensive fuel-ancho barobar vapor kartat?
normalised: Bore, tumi petrol kitni bachtaunk sodtaat, mhunn dista? Soddeak sogleank-ui taka dista, khass korun petrol-ache kimoti kaim zagear ekxim dha rupiya prati litre mhunn pavlyat. Kitem a-jeeb! Ani tumkan dista ki tumi tem khaarjik petrol-achin zaai titlen utponn bacheet?

unnormalised: Peleantolem chintop lok milegez dita. Tuka khobor asa, tea "kmpl" (kilometers per liter) figure manufacturers detat. Mhojea bapainchea poryanchea Maruti 800-in sumar 20 kmpl ditalem! Aizkal, mhojea SUV-in xarant sumar 12 kmpl mellta, pun highway-ar sumar 16 kmpl melltele. Vhoddlem difference, haina?
normalised: Pehleche vostu lok milez-aache visheant uloupak lagtaat. Tumi zannat, te kilometer prati litre-ache ankde ji utpadok uloiptaat. Mhojea baap-aanche poranne Maruti ut-xim-an dhaad kilometer prati litre deitaalo! Aaj-kaar, mojea S-U-V ekshich kilometer prati litre sheharant cholta, zaalear solla kilometer prati litre mahamaarg-aan cholta. Bhaari farak, vo?

unnormalised: Pun mileage ekuch kahanni nhoi. Driving habits vhodd factor asat. City traffic-an constantly accelerate ani brake korop, fuel-ak bhuk lagta kiteai vorim. Ashem chintat: zevhan tumi brake-ak slam kortat, tumi tea petrol-ak heat-an convert kortat brake pad-chea udexim – wasted energy! Smooth, consistent driving ek important, 50-70 kmph range-an steady speed-an vochpaak try korop.
normalised: Punn milez puri kahani na. Chaalane-ache rituch-in vhodd bhumika aasa. Nirantar dhaun ani roktann ghalun, khass korun shaharanti yaataayaat-in, petrol-achin khub peeyta. Asa vichar kara: tumi jya vellaar zora-aan roktaat, tumi te dukhaan kamalele petrol-ak taap-ant badoltaat brek ped-achin – vaayaa zatheli shakti! Shaant, nirantar chalane-ak mahatvacho, sadharnant pachaash te sattar kilometer prati ghenta-ache bhagak rakhunk zay.

unnormalised: Ani tire pressure-ui mhottvachem. Underinflated tires rolling resistance vaddoitat, ani mhanje tumchem engine-ak tanka vaddoitat gaddi samkar vorpaak. Tire pressure check kortat! Sumar gaddiyancher recommend kela pressure ek sticker driver-chea darachea bhitor asta, usually measured in PSI (pounds per square inch). Tea sweet spot-ak try korat; usually to 32-35 PSI asata.
normalised: Ani taair-aache dabav asa. Kam dabav-ache taair-aan ruchati virodh vadata, mhunnje tumachea enjin-ak gadyeak murekaad dhaavuk zata. Niyam-aan taair-aache dabav paaya! Zori-shear gadyeach-in chaalak-ache baju-ache daravazhe-ache bhitaar dabav dakhoytaat, sadharnant P-S-I (pounds per square inch)-an maaptaat. Tech dabav-ak lagun dhaavnk zay; sadharnant tem teesh te tees-panch P-S-I aasa.

unnormalised: Ani maintenance-ak visrunk naka! Zalear maintenance chukta zalear engine barobor kaam korunka. Regular servicing, তেল બદલવું, એર ફિલ્ટર બદલવું, आणि સ્પાર્ક પ્લગ તપાસવું, एक फरक निर्माण करूं सकत. एक जॅમ झालेલા एअर फिल्टर, उदाहरणार्थ, इंजिनाला हवेचा प्रवाह प्रतिबंधित करत, आणि त्याला अधिक इंधन जळायला लावतो.
normalised: Ani dekhabhal visrunk naaka! Dukhaan dekhabhal naslele enjin khammi utponn deeta. Niyam-aan sevaa, tel badalunk, hava-aache filttr badalunk, ani spark plak paayunk mahatvacho aasa. Bandh zathele hava-aache filttr-an, for example, enjin-ak hava dhaavuk rokta, takkaak chodd petrol jalauunk zata.

unnormalised: Weight-ui mhottvachem. Tumchi gaddi jetli zodd, titli fuel taka zai samkar vorpaak. Boottan unnecessary kitem korop load vaddoita. Hanv mhaka ek cricket kit dortalem “just in case,” pun taka mhaka khobor zalli ki taka unnecessary weight dortalem. Clutter kadun dita! Every kg counts, literally.
normalised: Vajan-ui mahatvacho. Tumachi gadye jyatke jaada, tatle chodd petrol tika dhaavuk zata. Anaavashyak vostu tumachea diggaant ubartat tyaak bhar vadavta. Haanvan maajea cricket kit-ak tika “kadi zaalo tori” mhunn dhaavtaalo, punn dista ki tem anaavashyak vajan bharot aasa. Aadhaarak kaad! Dor kilogram hisebaant yeta, kharokhar.

unnormalised: Fuel type-an ek role asunk xakta, pun to engine compatibility-vishe asata inherent efficiency differences-vishe nhoi. Manufacturer-in sanglalem follow korat. Sumar petrol gaddiyeo India-n 91 octane fuel-ar kam kartat. High octane fuel vaprun (jese "premium" petrol) tumchea mileage-an sudhar nhoi zale, tumchem engine specific dita tanka zai.
normalised: Petrol prakar-ui bhumika karta, punn tem chodd enjinachi melavnk zata, utponn farakaanchin na. Tumachea gadyeak utpadakache suuchna paaya. Indiant chodd petrol-aache gadye niymit ek-nymuti oktein petrol-aan dhaavnk kellyaat. Uche oktein petrol vaprunk (jeshe “premium” petrol) milez sudharnk na, jaavun ki tumachea enjin tika khas keli na.

unnormalised: Alternatives-vishe-ui chintat. Electric vehicles (EVs) vadod vaddod vorta, ani tanka karon-ui asat. Te petrol ani diesel gaddiyeo poryan barobor energy-efficient asat, ani running costs kuxik khala zata. Plus, tumi ek barobor environment-ak madad kortat! Of course, ek EV-chi peleinchi kimat vaddecho asata, ani charging infrastructure-ak India-n vaddod vorta.
normalised: Viklpaanchin vichar kara. Veej-aache gaddye (E-Vs) vadataat, ani tem bare karanank lagun. Tem petrol vo dizel-aache gadyaan pekhun chodd shakti bachauntaat, ani dhaavnk-ache kimoti khub kam aasa. Ani tumi ek shudh vatavaranak sadhaun kartaat! Jarurch, E-V-ache survaatiche kimot chodd aasa, ani chaarj korunk-ache nirman Indiant khub zagear pragatee zata.

unnormalised: Small thin-ui vaddoita. For example, air conditioning (AC) vaprun fuel consumption vaddoita, khas korun kuxik speed-ar. Zallear possible, tumche windows ugoddun AC-vaprun nhoi try korat.
normalised: Soddeach vostu-ui saduuk yetaat. For example, A-C vaprunk petrol vadata, khass korun khammi dhaavpaak. Zaalo tori, A-C udoun tumche daravazhe ugte thevunk sodh.

unnormalised: So, yeah, maximizing fuel efficiency ek multi-faceted thing. Hem driving habits, vehicle maintenance, tire pressure, weight management, ani fuel and vehicle-vishe asata. Tea kmpl number-vishe nhoi; hem smart ani conscious driver zai. Happy driving (ani saving)!
normalised: Ani, hanv mhuntaan, petrol-achi kitni bachtaunk sodtole jori vo soball zaata. Tem chaalane-ache riti, vaahan-achi dekhabhal, taair-aache dabav, vajan samballunk, ani petrol ani vaahan dhundtak-ach-aan yevunk zata. Tem ek kilometre prati litre ankdoch-in dhaavnk na; tem shyaaan ani jagruk chalak jaunk mahatvacho. Khushi-che dhaavnk (ani bachaunk)!
